content:
Links to the tools:

  • Inferno IPS Tests (hosted
    • Inferno IPS Tests (source code)
  • Proxy for collecting API interactions
  • FHIR Server with IPS resources (supports read interactions and type level search)
  • Demo script to spin up the server, proxy and inferno
  • Web Resource Validator (hosted, link to source in footer)

Happy to test them out or walk through them with others!

Any additional tests you want to see? Features that you think would be helpful? Let us know!
